title: Mystery Lady: An American Revolution Romance
description: Found battered and near death, a mysterious raven-haired beauty brings turmoil and intrigue into the lives of the Chandlers in post-Revolutionary America when she wakes up and reveals a shocking truth—the brutal attack left her with no memory. Immediately drawn to her fiery spirit and captivating violet eyes, Zachary Chandler vows to find the man responsible and learn her identity. The only clues—her pronounced English accent and a gold pocket watch with the King's crest—point to a conspiracy that will either reveal her to be a traitorous British spy or an innocent victim. As dark forces work furiously to eliminate her, Zach struggles to uncover the truth while protecting his heart. Is his mystery lady the angel she appears to be or the ultimate key to his downfall?
author: Anjannette Conner
